data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galinskaya, Tatiana V., Shatalkin, Anatole I. (2013): Neohemigaster Malloch, 1939 and Pterogenia Bigot, 1859 (Diptera: Platystomatidae) from eastern Eurasia, with the description of four new species. Zootaxa 3666 (2): 267-285, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3666.2.9
